title: Is 2020 the year for big changes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Absolutely, this will be the year of winning the war on government corruption and draining the cesspool called congress who have abused the system for political reasons and gains rather than to uphold the Constitution. The corrupt FBI, CIA and deep state embedded conspiracy traitors will all be exposed for the first time in history. This will be a real awakening year where the masses of asses who are clueless will be forced to face reality of just how corrupt government has become. It will be a year of awakening, so WAKE UP AMERICA

2020 will be remember for Covid-19. Yes a lot of people recovered from it, but a lot died from it. Here in the USA, we just reached the 4,000,000 dead mark and 15 days earlier we had just surpassed 3,000,000 dead. At this rate Earth could be extinct in several years. The Black Plague covered a lot of Europe and it wasn’t until over a century the plague was completely gone. I’d like to see more of my grandchildren.
